text: Allah irshad farmaye ga kay yeh woh din hai kay jo log sachay thay unn ka sacha hona unn kay kaam aayega unn ko baagh milen gay jin kay neechay nehren jari hongi jin mein woh hamesha hamesha ko rahen gay. Allah Taalaa inn say razi aur khush aur yeh Allah say razi aur khush hain yeh bari (bhaari) kamyaabi hai
